title: Fix SmartHome IoT dashboard chart rendering bug
description: Charts not loading on IoT dashboard after latest deployment. Investor demo tomorrow. URGENT.

title: Reply to BioPharm Research inquiry
description: Dr. Andreas Vogel sent high-value inquiry (€70K+) for clinical trial data visualization. Respond within 24 hours.

title: Prepare SecureNet kickoff meeting materials
description: Kickoff meeting Feb 18. Prepare: project timeline, team structure, access requirements, sprint plan.

title: Gather 2025 tax documents
description: Tax accountant needs by March 15: invoices, expenses, bank statements, insurance, contractor agreements.

title: Follow up on CloudFirst overdue invoice
description: Invoice INV-2026-020 (€8,500) is 10 days overdue. Anna promised payment by end of week. Verify payment received.

title: Prepare annual contract draft for TechVision
description: Hans wants to formalize annual partnership. Draft contract terms before Friday call.

title: Send FinanceHub proposal revision
description: Address Michael's questions: 7-week timeline, Stripe migration included, 3-month warranty. Update proposal doc.

title: Scope customer segmentation module for RetailMax
description: Thomas requested: RFM analysis, cohort analysis, custom segment builder, marketing tool export. Prepare quote.

title: Share team structure with SecureNet
description: Klaus shared their team (4 people). Need to respond with our team structure for the project.

title: Prepare Q1 financial slides for Board Meeting
description: Board meeting today at 2 PM. Need slides covering revenue, growth, client metrics, Q2 plan.

title: Schedule discovery call with GreenEnergy
description: Lisa Braun interested in solar monitoring dashboard. Prepare IoT portfolio examples before call.

title: Schedule DataStream Q1 review
description: Julia requested Q1 review in first week of March. Set up meeting and prepare progress report.

title: Investigate RetailMax API rate limit increase
description: Thomas reports hitting 100 req/s during peak hours, needs 200. Evaluate infrastructure capacity.

title: Set up maintenance notification for Feb 22
description: Hetzner server maintenance Feb 22, 2-4 AM CET. Create maintenance page and notify affected clients.

title: Prepare Kubernetes monitoring estimate for CloudFirst
description: Anna wants K8s monitoring added. Scope: 3-4 weeks, €12-15K. Prepare detailed estimate before monthly sync.

title: Address MedTech compliance requirements
description: Dr. Hoffmann's team has 3 additional requirements: EU data residency, quarterly audits, 99.9% SLA. Review and respond.

title: Review SecureNet updated requirements
description: Changed from batch to real-time monitoring, added SIEM integration and SOC2 reporting. Budget increased to €60K.

title: Update sprint 13 planning board
description: Sprint 12 completed (90%). Carry over BIZ-234 (mobile charts) and BIZ-241 (dark mode calendar). Plan sprint 13.

title: Reply to FoodTech Berlin about pricing
description: Sophie asked about startup-friendly pricing and IoT experience. Draft response with tier options.

title: Prepare LogiTrans PoC proposal
description: Peter asked about PoC at reduced rate. SAP integration, mobile app timeline. Draft PoC scope and pricing.
